description:
I went into this blindly, not knowing what to expect, but being fully aware of how this could go completely left field and be left with nothing. I needed a cake maker for my girls first birthday party. Sure, I could have gone to Safeway or Costco, but this was THE big birthday, and outside of their quincenara, the motto was "go big or go home".

However, seeing as though we are basic people with basic means (and SF being super expensive in general), we decided to go with a speciality cake that was homemade. Thank goodness for yelp reviews. I checked out some by Jennifer, and figured that she would be the best option (especially given that the birthday was fast approaching).

Jennifer was very responsive, and I was able to provide her with an sample photo of what I was looking for. She let me customize the cake to my liking as well, which I loved. I was able to pick the cake up a couple days before the party, which was very convenient for me. I didn't know what to expect (I was just hoping that the cake turned out well), but Jennifer definitely hasions. The cake looked amazing and was exactly we were looking for. Best of all: the cake was so delicious and moist! Everyone loved it and I barely got a slice of it, which is always a great sign.

Jennifer is the real deal, and I have been recommending her ever since. Best of all, she has an electronic pay system, which makes it very easy to pay. Definitely looking forward to planning another event just so I can eat cake (pub intended).
author: Tracy T.

description: Thank you Jennifer for another delicious and beautiful cake. It looked exactly the way I wanted it. I appreciate you taking the time to deliver for me, even if it was a small cake. I've been a loyal customer for almost 10 years and will continue to order her cakes for my family parties and events.
author: Miriam Araceli R.

description:
Thank you Yelp for leading me to Sweet Art by Jennifer! 

I was looking last minute for a wedding cake maker. Jennifer caught my eye, I called her, sent her my wedding cake inspiration, and she sent me a quote and flavor list that same day. The whole experience was so easy and seamless! She graciously allowed me to try four cake/icing combos at the tasting when I couldn't make up my mind. I appreciated her prompt responses to my emails and calls and her consummate professionalism throughout this process.

Did I mention that the cake was delicious? I'm sad that I didn't get to eat more!!
author: Joanne Y.

description: Jennifer delivered on her promise for my childhood birthday cake, and let me tell you, there wasn't a slice left after my coworkers got to it. She is now my de-factor baker, not only for my birthday cake, but for all other special occasions. She's the best!
author: Maurice R.

description: I found her on Yelp and I am so glad. I ordered my daughter's birthday cake from Jennifer.  The cake was beautiful, it was moist, and not overly sweet. Everyone complimented the cake.  I am sure when there kids have party they want her to bake it too.  All the guests loved it. I will definitely use her going forward. Thank you Jennifer.
author: Linda Y.

description:
Ordered a Photo Cake from Jennifer for my hubby and brother-in-law's birthdays and it turned out so good. The red velvet cake was so delicious as well. Very satisfied and a happy customer. I will definitely order cakes from her again. 

Thank you Jennifer!
author: Jennifer Q.

description: I ordered this cute fire fighter graduation cake from Jennifer. I ordered just 1 week in advance, shared some ideas over email and phone and TADA. It was perfect. I ordered the white cake with fresh strawberries and I loved how not too much sweeet the cake tasted. The cake was larger than expected and her pricing is so reasonable. Thank you
author: Bright I.

description:
After a few unresponsive photo cake providers such as the Cake G***** (rhymes with mallory), we were fortunate to find Jennifer.

It's surprising really how difficult it is to find someone who can do a photo cake. (Don't waste your time searching for "photo cake" on google and go to these rip off cake shops that are making cakes out of a storefront that looks more like a makeshift painters studio.)

We ordered a quarter sheet photo cake for a kid's birthday party from Jennifer and it was excellent. It was a standard vanilla cake and it was also not overly sweet which is exactly what we wanted. Definitely our first choice going forward. And a great value.

Be aware however, that as an individual business owner you need to plan ahead and realize that you are getting an excellent value because she's not some massive operation. Make sure to confirm by phone.

If you are super price sensitive and put last minute convenience over quality then go to Costco (sorry but sort of like Blondie's pizza, there's only so much cheap, high volume, I can tolerate) If you aren't a procrastinator and appreciate someone who cares about the product and delivers high quality at a reasonable price, then Jennifer is for you.
author: Yohdaddy M.

description: Jennifer was a great find for us. The cakes tasted amazing (4 different layers, 4 different flavors) and looked amazing. She did exactly what I asked for, came to set it up right when I asked her to. What a great cake and a great value for our company event!
author: Michelle P.

description:
Jennifer did a great job on a naked cake for my cousins baby shower! Everyone loved it and we got so many compliments not to mention it was delicious!

Thank you again Jennifer!
author: Gema G.

description:
We did a photo birthday cake and it turned out amazing. It was actually an illustration with the same photo technique (jpeg image file). Jennifer's communication and service was so helpful! She was prompt, friendly, and prices super reasonable. I plan to be a returning customer. 

I also searched and tried to hear back from others about a photo cake. Don't bother with them. Just call Jennifer!
author: Pamplemouse L.

description:
Jennifer made the most amazing cake for my friends Birthday. When I asked her if she could frame the outside with mini frosting corndogs (yes, the birthday guy loves corndogs) she hand made them out of fondant. Cake was a hit!!! 
She was also very communicative and easy to work with!
author: Kelly H.

description: Jennifer did a beautiful job on my wedding cake! I ordered the butter cream white/fresh strawberries with whip cream filling. The cake was delicious and was a big hit with our guests. Thank you so much Jennifer!
author: Karen J.

description: Such a beautiful and delicious! cake. Thank you Jennifer for making my friends' special day more memorable!! Everyone loved it and stared as it entered the room :)
author: Silvia C.

description: Jennifer has been making cakes for me for 7 years now- the first being my Minnie Mouse babyshower cake. She has NEVER let me down. Her prices are so affordable and her work is great. The cakes are always super moist each time and my guests has enjoyed every cake Jennifer has made each year!
author: Dee B.

description:
Usually not a fan of sheet cakes but I needed to get a sheet cake for a work anniversary. Her cake was AMAZING. Moist, flavorful and decoration just like I asked. She helped make my first year work anniversary amazing! She also whipped it up for me on late noticed (called on Friday, picked up Tuesday morning).

If you need a picture cake, or just a really amazing cake, go to Jennifer!
author: Whitney R.

description:
I hate to have write this review, but after this last experience, I just felt I had to share my input. Jennifer has made 2 birthday cakes for my daughter over the past few years, and she was always on top of it. The cakes she made looked really great, too. However, toward the end of this summer, I emailed her to inquire about ordering a birthday cake for my son's 1st birthday. I never heard back after more than 2 weeks, so I emailed again. Even after the follow-up email, still no reply.

I had to look for someone else to order my son's birthday cake from, but I was kinda sad about it because I was really looking forward to another one of Jennifer's creations.

Sad to say I won't be ordering from her again after this experience.
author: Anne Y.

description: She made edible photos for a cake for me with very last-minute notice and they are amazing. She was very prompt and helpful and the pricing was really reasonable. I've ordered other custom cakes before, and other cake shops I've worked with were not nearly as accommodating. Thank you Jennifer!
author: Rose C.

description:
Purchased a cake from a different bakery that claimed it could print an edible photo onto a cake....when that cake arrived it looked like a North Korean dictator's portrait instead of my friend's face. It was so bad I didn't know whether I should laugh or cry (I did both). 

I only had a few hours to correct the problem so I yelped "photo cake" and Sweet Art by Jennifer popped up. I called and spoke directly with Jennifer - she was unbelievably kind, understanding and accommodating. Not only was she able to print out the photo I needed within a few minutes but it was dirt cheap, too. 

Without hesitation the next time I need a creative cake made, Jennifer is first person I'll call. She's the Ghost Busters of cake disasters.
author: Jason O.

description:
Jennifer is attentive, however the printed cake she made for us had an incorrect aspect ratio, and the picture / cake came out looking quite ugly. She could have given me a call or asked prior to making this. 

When we discussed about this, she was not helpful in explaining why it happened, and just said that, it was because she is busy, and had to get it done this morning. 

If she could have reached out to me directly, I would have been been more than happy to help. I understand that the request was a bit of a challenge, to split the image across two pieces, but the outcome is not acceptable, especially when it is for someone's 30th birthday.
author: Linda C.

description:
Jennifer saved the day! I was looking for a cake shop that could do a custom cake with a quick turnaround, but most of them require at least 2 weeks notice and $100 minimum cake order. I placed an order with Jennifer 4 days in advance, and she squeezed it into her schedule!!! 

The cake turned out very tasty as well. Will definitely order again!
author: Jeanette S.

description: Everybody loved my son's cake it turned out perfect! Jennifer was extremely professional and I highly recommend her if you live in San Francisco.
author: Krystle H.

description: I went to Jennifer 3 times for my kids birthday cakes. I usually provide my own cake toppers and it turns out good. Cake has always been moist and decorations around it was excellent. I was very impressed by the last order, which was earlier this week. I'll definitely order from Jennifer in the feature.
author: Jen T.

description:
This is my 5th or more time ordering from Jennifer. She is more than amazing!!! I referred all my friends and family to order their take from Jennifer. 

The Chanel cake was above and beyond!!! The price was just right and even delivered to San Francisco. 

Wouldn't go anywhere else!!

Thank you so much Jenn!!!
author: Emily L.

description:
We ordered a banana &cream cheese wedding cake. It was a big hit. Our entire party thoroughly enjoyed it. 

We met Jennifer at her house for a cake tasting. The ordering process was easy via email & follow up phone calls. The cake was 14' & 12' & cost $375.
author: Faaae L.

description: We ordered a gender reveal cake from Jennifer, and it was gorgeous! Jennifer was really easy to work with, the cake tasted amazing and it surpassed all expectations. Definitely will be ordering all cakes from Jennifer from here on out!!!! Thanks again for helping us make the surprise especially sweet.
author: Sarah P.

description:
Jennifer was super easy to work with and just a delight.

We showed her an idea of what we want the cake to look like, picked a flavor from her complimentary sampling, dropped off our topper, and never had to worry about the cake ever again.

She dropped it off and set it up on time and honestly, the fact that I never had to stress about this was HUGE. Jennifer was super easy to work with and just an all around nice lady. Plus, she has very competitive pricing.

The cake looked fantastic and it tasted wonderful. We got lots of compliments on both the appearance and the flavor, so we're super happy. I look forward to working with Jennifer again for any other fancy cake needs!
author: Tatiana T.

description: Jennifer saved my life.  Lol.  What an amazing lady.  My manager, on a Monday, asked me to order a half sheet photo cake, and needed it by Wednesday afternoon.  I had to create the artwork, but trying to find a bakery willing to do a photo cake at the last minute was nearly impossible.  Until I found Jennifer on Yelp.  And she lives near me too, and she did it.  Helped me pull a miracle and my boss was happy.  Said the cake was moist and delicious.  If only I got a slice for all the stress he put me under, but as long as he's happy, I'm happy. So thank you Jennifer.  You're my miracle worker.
author: Janice F.

description:
Big fan of Jennifer! She works out of her home so she has way less overhead than most bakeries. It does NOT have to cost a thousand dollars to get a simple frosted cake!!!

Jennifer made me a simple tiered cake with old fashioned frosting. It looked gorgeous and simple. She also made sheet cakes in the same flavors for serving the rest of the guests. I normally hate wedding cake because it's usually too dry and too sweet. We tasted cakes at a lot of expensive bakeries and none of them could stand up to Jennifers' work. We LOVED it! My favorite was the lemon cake with raspberry filling.... 

Her prices are super reasonable and she charges just a nominal fee for delivery in the Bay Area. We're thinking about getting a mini cake from her for our first anniversary just to relive the day.  :)
author: Angela C.

description: Jennifer was great! Wonderful, attentive customer service and a gorgeous photo cake for my daughter's 14th birthday. I will definitely keep coming back!!
author: CAROLYN D.

description:
I was looking for someone to make a picture cake for a surprise party and it was so difficult to find anyone to do that in San Francisco. After reading all the wonderful reviews on yelp and looking through some of the pictures. I contacted Jennifer and was able to place an order of my own. 

I was not disappointed.  

The picture cake turned out so well. Her price was really very reasonable. All our friends couldn't stop telling us how amazing the cake looked and how moist it was. I had asked for a chocolate cake with a hazelnut filling and it was perfect! I'm so happy with the way the cake turned out, Jennifer's responsiveness, price and help with figuring out the details I had difficulty with. I will definitely be ordering from her again. 

Thank you so much Jennifer!
author: Louisa D.

description:
Time and time again, Jennifer does an amazing job. In 2011, she created our wedding cake, and I've been using her for every since for special occasions. There isn't a flavor she can't do. Her cakes look good AND taste good. 

Thank you, Jennifer!
author: Valerie A.

description: Jennifer did a cake for my 40th birthday, and I could not have been happier.  It was stunningly beautiful, exactly what we had discussed, and the cake itself was moist and delicious.  I cannot recommend her more highly!
author: Stephanie S.

description: Amazing cake.  Jennifer was very easy to work with over email and dealt with all my questions.  She made a scrumptious cake for my nephew's birthday.  Will certainly use her again in the future!
author: Meghann E.

description: Jennifer has been baking my daughter's birthday cake every year for the past 5 years. Every year, she always surprises us with her creativity. This year, I decided to order two birthday cakes for two separate occasions -- princess and shopkins theme. We got so many compliments by our guests. I will see you next year Jennifer!
author: Karen T.

description:
We needed a great-looking Powerpuff Girls cake for our daughter's birthday, and found Sweet Art by Jennifer on Yelp. She had great reviews, and we put in the order on Monday before a Saturday morning birthday party. We sent Jennifer a jpg of an image we wanted on the cake, customized the cake - chocolate cake with chocolate filling and pink icing - as well as the message. Jennifer said it was no problem!

Picked up the cake on Saturday morning right on time. The cake was gorgeous and everyone (especially my daughter) were super wowed by how it looked! Best of all, the cake was super moist and delicious. Would definitely recommend Jennifer and would order from her again. Super happy with our cake and the price for the work.
author: Annette C.

description: The cake for my daughters first birthday was amazing, all the guests liked it. Thank u so much Jennifer you are the best
author: Moutalib I.

description: I emailed her twice for my baby shower cake. Literally no reply. I dont like this when it is an active business and I have to chase them down.
author: Bijal S.

description:
Jennifer is sweet...and so are her cakes!

We hired Jennifer to create a 6 inch cake and cupcakes for our wedding. We showed her a picture of how we wanted things to look like and she made it so well. Her cupcakes were so delicious that our wedding guests told us they came back for thirds! 

Jennifer was so helpful in finding the perfect cupcake liners to fit with the theme of our wedding. In addition, her delivery and cupcake rental stand delivery is very afford compared to others in the City. In fact, her and a friend were going to be near the venue when our wedding was set to end and so she offered to pick up the cupcake stand so it was one less thing for us to worry about!

She is a wonderful and joy to work with. Recommend!
author: Michelle K.

description:
I ordered my daughter a cake from Jennifer with out even tasting samples. I was a bit nervous the day of the party because I was not sure how it would turn out or taste. She made me a sea shell themed 3tier cake with red velvet and chocolate ganache. She dropped it of for us at the event on time. Everyone loved the cake design. Once it was time to cut it and eat all my guests loved it. They said it was so good. Which made me very happy.  Tried some and it was tasty.
Thanks
author: Des A.

description:
Jennifer did a great job on my baby shower cake at such a reasonable price compared to other bakeries.  She customize it the way I wanted - two layer round tiered cake - one layer chocolate with chocolate mocha filling and the other a vanilla cake with raspberry filling. So Delicious and moist.  It looked amazing and so professional.  See photo.  

I picked it up on a Sunday morning at 8:30am and she had it ready to go and perfectly fresh.  I highly recommend Jennifer to make a beautiful cake for any of your special occasions!
author: Leenda T.

description:
I picked Jennifer based on the good reviews on Yelp and I'm disappointed with my result. I ordered an owl 2-tier cake and 20 pink owl cupcakes for my daughter's 1st bday party. I was so excited to see the cake because that's the centerpiece of the party.

I gave Jennifer a pictures of how I would like the cake and cupcakes to be and was told she will make it exactly like the pictures. The cake and cupcakes did not look like the pictures and the details were messy. My guests told me the cake did not taste good. There were 50 guests and the bottom 12" tier stayed untouched. I had to throw it away because it does not taste good and no one wants to take it to go. It's the worst cake I ever tasted....not only did it not look good, it does not taste good.
author: Lin L.

description: Jennifer did an amazing job on my sons 3 tiered Sesame Street birthday cake. It was not only a beautiful cake, it was delicious! I ordered a vanilla cake with custard filling. The cake was very moist and not overly sweet. Her prices are reasonable and she is easy to work with. I would highly recommend Jennifer.
author: Susanna C.

description:
Jennifer did a fantastic job on two cakes for me, the first for a bridal shower and the other for my pastor's ordination. Both cakes were perfect, in both look and taste. 

The shower cake used a photo of the bride and groom and was quite a hit. There are very few places in the city that do photo cakes and so I was thrilled to find Jennifer. This cake was lemon with a fudge filling and was perfect for the bride who wanted lemon and chocolate together. The lemon was the perfect blend of tart and sweet, and so moist having been brushed with a lemon syrup.

For the ordination cake, I wanted 3 different logos on it and Jennifer translated them perfectly, using 2 different photo transfers and then piping one by hand. The chocolate cake with raspberry filling was OUT OF THIS WORLD. Everyone was going back for more. 

Jennifer is a wonderful find in San Francisco!!
author: Nina W.

description:
I needed a sheet cake but not just any cake. I needed a logo cake but where to find one? Started with a Google search that eventually brought me to Sweet Art by Jennifer. She had solid reviews, the pictures of her cakes were nice and professional looking and the price was competitive. I called her up, she had several choices of cakes and frostings to choose from, red velvet and cream cheese called me. I emailed her the logo I wanted on the cake, sent her my Amex number and agreed on a pick up date.

Today I went to pick up the cake, I was blown away at how good this cake looked. The Logo was exactly what I emailed to her, I knew my cake would be a big hit. At the event all the guests not only were impressed with the logo cake but the flavor was moist and rich and the cream cheese frosting complimented the red velvet.

It was so good that all of the half sheet cake went! That's a great cake!!

Would I use Sweet Art by Jennifer again? You bet.

Thank you Jennifer, here's to your continued success.
author: David P.

description: I was searching for someone who can make a special cake for my sisters birthday. Being it was a Tiffany's theme, I wanted a cake that will look amazing. I read some nice reviews on Jennifer's work and decided to place and order. When I had picked up the cake, I was amazed how beautiful and delicious it turned out. I highly recommend the yellow cake with fresh strawberries and Marble with mocha filling. Absolutely yum!!
author: Adalia R.

description: Don't want to be that one bad review but I do have to say the communication is/was horrible.. I contacted Jennifer via email at first, no response until 1 week later which was apologized for the late response.. I replied to her email, heard nothing.. Decided to call a couple days after left voicemail and still no response to this day.. It's frustrating/difficult when your wedding is a month away & trying to find a cake..
author: Jai M.

description:
I ordered a lemon with cream cheese frosting sheet photo cake for my coworker's farewell lunch and was a little nervous that the cake wouldn't execute.  I was so pleasantly surprised when I received it!

The cake was so well-done.  My coworker was so surprised and happy with the cake, I swear she had tears in her eyes!

Accurate execution of design (not an easy design, by any means), moist, and delicious.  Bravo!
author: Melody Y.

description:
I wanted to order a special cake for my son's 1st birthday in April. His theme was SF Giants and Mickey. I sent Jennifer a pic of the theme and she put together an amazing cake! We went with the two tiered cake with SF Giants colors and baseball accessories. She even added Mickey ears to the top that made the cake fit the them of the party. 

The cake was very moist and delicious.  Would definitely come to her for our next themed cake.
author: Crystal A.

description: Jennifer did a wonderful job with my son's red egg and ginger party cake. I showed her a picture that I liked and she replicated it perfectly. Not only did the cake look nice, but it tasted so good too! Her cakes are super moist and not overly sweet which I like. Her prices are so reasonable as well. Everyone loved her cake. thanks Jennifer!
author: Connie C.

description: Just had Jennifer make a photo cake for my birthday - it was great!!! The big surprise was how good it tasted; I thought having a cool photo on the top was enough, but it was also delicious! Big hit at the party!
author: Boban Z.

description:
Jennifer made my wedding cake last year and it was perfect so I had to have her make my 30th birthday cake. I emailed a pic of the cake I wanted and she nailed it! It was perfect! All my friends loved it! I ordered the carrot cake with cream cheese frosting...it was super moist and delish! 

Thanks again Jennifer for another perfect cake! You are AMAZING at what you do!
author: Jo S.

description: I really don't know what to say. Perhaps, you get what you pay for? I added some pictures of the cake and you could judge it yourself. Sent her the picture and told her I wanted a cake like this with different flower. She told me she could make the cake but not sure about the flower. Then she sent me a picture of flower she could make and I like it so i said let's use the flower. The picture of the cake that I sent her had some little details around the cake and when I got the cake I was shocked that it was so plain and really really MESSY. It looked unfinished. Perhaps she could let me know first if she couldn't or not gonna do the details! It was for my sister 21st bday. And she loves to bake and decorate cake too. I was so embarrased to even give it to her. I just still couldn't believe with all the good reviews on yelp with the cake that I got. I am very disappointed.
author: Pink J.

description: I use jennifer for all my family birthday celebrations. She is easy to work with, prices are good, cakes always taste great, and of course always are cute.
author: Jmarania M.

description: We ordered a cake for my baby shower and totally surprised by how she managed to fulfill our order. I am diabetic and I requested for less sweet and she made it without taking out the awesomeness of the cake. We picked red velvet flavor with coconut cream fillings and loved it.. We are totally gonna order again for next special occasions. thanks Jennifer!
author: Vinchia O.

description: The cake I ordered from Jennifer was everything I wanted for my son's first birthday cake :) I ordered a fondant chocolate cake with strawberries with whipped cream. Sooo yummy! The chocolate cake was so moist and delicious I craved it for days after the party. Jennifer was very easy to communicate with through email. I sent her a picture of my son's party theme and she made the perfect cake to complete his monkey themed party. The price was very reasonable. We ordered a cake for 30-40 people and it could have easily served a lot more!
author: Stephanie A.

description: My husband and I found Jennifer on Yelp and had a great experience working with Jennifer for our wedding last month! For our first meeting she invited us to her home just one neighborhood over from ours. She sent us her flavor menu ahead of time and made us three tasting mini cakes with our choice of cake flavor, filling, and icing combos - amazing! She was professional and also took time to get to know us and our preferences. We loved all the cakes but ultimately chose the marble cake with cream cheese filling and fondant icing. It was delicious and we got so many compliments from our guests later! Plus, Jennifer very kindly helped me decide on colors for the cake and let us use her beautiful silver vintage cake stand for the event! Would highly recommend Jennifer for anyone in the area looking for a delicious, quality, affordable cake!
author: Lauren R.

description: Jennifer made a birthday cake for our 8 year old.  The cake itself was the freshest, most delicious cake ever and it was a hit at the party.  Quality ingredients and options. The photo icing process was also amazing and well done - much clearer with thought put into sizing and placement.  Better than chain places like Stone Cold Creamery that offer similar photo icing services.  I will be ordering many more cakes and I cannot recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer enough!
author: Dan S.

description: Jennifer made me the most beautiful cake in the world she's so nice and very understanding I was about an hour and a half late picking it up but everybody enjoyed the birthday cake very delicious will definitely call her again in the future and also very reasonable as far as pricing
author: Ericka C.

description: Jennifer Rocks!! She did a custom sheet cake for my corporate event, it was incredible and tasted as good as it looked! I'll post a picture. My new favorite for all my Sweet Needs!
author: Jill D.

description: Our wedding cake came out beautifully just as we wanted it. We recommend the coconut filling, it was amazing. Reasonable pricing for sweet art!
author: Noel S.

description: What can I say, Jennifer is amazing! Not only are her cakes delicious, they are just as beautiful as they are tasty. I approached her to make a cake for my husband's and my anniversary and she truly made it memorable with the cake she made. I only showed her a picture of what I wanted it to look like and she replicated it flawlessly. Not only is she a talented baker, she is very kind and professional to work with. I highly recommend her and will definitely have her make another cake for us in the future!
author: Stacy H.

description:
I've never been to her actual bakery but I caught a bit of her pastries at the San Mateo Farmers Market and after some hemming and hawing, I purchased a cherry tart and a fudge brownie for only $4 all together. Her presentation was excellent and the cherry tart just drew me in close with their beautiful rock sugar sugar. Her friendly disposition was as equally sweet and her answers to my many questions were detailed and patient-MAD KUDOS to anyone who can put up with my cupcake questions. 

Did I mention she sells really adorable cupcakes? I couldn't carry it with all the other stuff I had in my arms so I had to say goodbye to the cute chocolate ones and the buttercream ones-so hard! I did manage to get a brownie since she individually wraps her brownies and they were soft and really chocolaty. 

I could come back for her cherry tart and maybe get an apple or apricot next time. The flakey pastry was evenly balanced with the filling and I normally automatically get drawn to a cup of coffee but not this time. (Clap clap clap clap clap) Bravo Jennifer!
author: Jessica K.

description:
Jennifer created the cutest, most delectible cake for my baby shower.  She was very responsive in the planning process, delivered the cake in pristine condition and on time, and was very attentive to all of the details I requested--it only took one email and a couple photos to get the exact cake I envisioned for the shower.   The cake made a beautiful centerpiece for the occasion.

And how did the cake taste? My goodness, it was good!  I chose the marble cake with strawberries and chocolate filling--I wasn't sure if this would turn out well, given that I've never had that flavor combination before, but it tasted divine.  The cake was moist, spongey, and not too dense, the chocolate filling had savory chunks of chocolate in it, and the strawberries were fresh.  Even the fondant icing was good!  My guests, even the ones that bake themselves, really enjoyed the cake.

I was worried about the small two-tiered cake being enough for 45 people, but it turned out to being more than sufficient, and everyone who loved the cake was able to have seconds, if they wanted.

I would definitely recommend Jennifer's cakes to anyone--she's a baking goddess!
author: Audacity L.

description: Jennifer was another wedding vendor who was a breeze to work with!  For our tasting appointment, she prepared mini cakes in three different flavors.  Once I had her custard cake, I knew I wanted it for our wedding! I was going for tasteful simplicity and she delivered. Fair pricing and great service! The custard cake was a hit with our guests too!
author: Sandala C.

description:
Couldn't be happier with my cake!!!!
Jennifer was so great to work with- she hit every detail I asked for on the nose!!!
Not only did it look amazing but tasted as equally good-
She also made beautiful cookies for me and they were perfect !!!
Cake was delivered on time and reasonably priced!!
Can't wait to use her again !!!!
author: ryan H.

description:
Jennifer made a cake for me back in August for my boyfriends birthday with a picture of our dog Bruce, the blue nose pitbull on it. It was a huge success!!! Not only did it look amazing, but the cake itself was delicious!!! One of my girlfriends is having a birthday this weekend and I am having Jennifer make another cake for me. I have decided that this will be my new signature for all of my friends birthdays. Jennifer is very quick with her responses and was wonderful to do business with. After doing a lot of research online for Image Cakes her prices were very fair and the quality far exceeded my expectations! 

I highly recommend her for any event you have that needs beautiful sweets!!!
author: Jessica B.

description:
Jennifer you are wonderful!!. 

I ordered a logo/picture cake (which no one in San Francisco does any longer)  and it came out magnificent!! The flavor was chocolate with chocolate filling with a vanilla butter cream frosting. The taste was amazing!!!. 

I have a lot of picky eaters at this party, and i myself can not stand most cakes because it is way to sweet. Jennifer's cake was not overly sweet and out of a group of 30, everyone had something positive to say. The cake was loved!! The cake was moist and just the right amount of sweet. I highly recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer. I will be a client again and again.

Jennifer - thank you for making our cake a great hit, very tasty and thank you for being easy to work with!!! See you again.
author: Shortys Mom m.

description: I ordered a baby shower cake and gave Jennifer a picture for the design. She did a great job and the price was very reasonable! I chose vanilla with lemon filling - cake was very moist. I thought the lemon would be a cream filling, but it wasn't. However, it was still yummy! Jennifer also does photo cakes. I saw a super cute 2 tiered Minnie Mouse cake when I went for pickup. Jennifer will definitely be my "go-to" baker now!
author: Freckles H.

description:
I would definitely recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer!  She did an A-M-A-Z-I-N-G job replicating a cake I wanted for my niece's tinkerbell themed birthday.  Not only did she replicate it to the T, but she made it look even better!  Totally friendly, great service, great cake, and great price.  CANT BEAT THAT!!! I will be using her for many many other cakes to come.  LOVE Sweet Art by Jennifer!

Thank you SO SO much!
author: ngoc l.

description: Jennifer was great! She was easy to work with I communicated with her via email sent her a picture of what I was looking for and my budget and she was able to work with it! My chocolate cake was so moist I unfortunately did not to get to taste the red velvet but everyone said it was delicious!
author: Celia L.

description: I ordered a chocolate photocake with raspberry filling only a few days before my event.  I think Jennifer heard the urgency in my voicemail and responded quickly the next day.  The cake was moist and delicious and the photo was perfect.  The price of the cake was great, and she delivered it to my office right before the event for an additional fee.  I will definitely order from her again.  Thanks Jennifer!
author: Cynthia C.

description: Jennifer you did an amazing job with my order,Thank you so much. I ordered custom cupcakes for my husband's SFPD graduation and they were not only delicious but beautiful. Jennifer was able to top half of the cupcakes with a replica of his badge and the other half with the SFPD patch. Everyone loved the cupcakes-- chocolate with mocha buttercream--and Jennifer even threw in two cupcakes free of charge!  Great quality, pricing and customer service!  Thanks again Jennifer for making such a great day even sweeter!
author: Gina A.

description:
Let me preface my review by saying (again) that I was born without a sweet tooth.  Because of this, what follows should mean even more ...

*********

EAT JENNIFER'S STUFF!!! I LOVE the baked goods that Jennifer makes (at least the ones that I've tasted): the most moist, flavorful and satisfying cupcakes and cakes (she makes candies and cookies, but I haven't had a chance to try those yet) that you'll ever taste.

If you've got a birthday or party of some sort coming up (or even if you just want something sweet for yourself), you've got to order from Jennifer.  Her stuff will blow your mind!!

You can choose from several flavors of cake (Chocolate, White, Lemon, Lemon Poppyseed, Marble, Almond Poppyseed, Spice, OrangeCarrot, Chocolate Hazelnut, Chocolate Kahlua, Coconut, Tres Leches, Applesauce, Banana Nut), several flavors of filling (Diced Apple, Whole Cherry, Lemon, Raspberry, Strawberry, Pineapple, various mousses) and icings (also a ton to choose from).

Go here ASAP:  http://www.sweetartbyjennifer.com/
Order spice cupcakes with apple filling and buttercream icing... or carrot cake (OMG!! that's sooooooo good!!)... or ... anything. :)
author: Jenny K.

description:
Our son just had his 1st b-day party.  We were looking for a quality cake  that wouldn't break the bank and boy did we find it! Jennifers stuff is at par with the higher end places.... We got a cake for $120 that fed 40 people.  That same cake at a fancier place would easily have been twice the price.

Btw, the chocolate is damn good!!! Thanks to Jennifer and her cat!
author: J G.

description:
We recently Celebrated My Friends 40th Birthday at Baretta Restaurant. Jennifer delivered a cake that was perfect. It was delicious !!! And a affordable . We had a picture cake for 10ppl, she only charged us $40. I live in Sacramento, so It was nice to be able to email a photo & get everything done online with her. She delivered the cake on time and everything went smooth.
Thank you soooooo much for making our night effortless !!!! Lots of Mahalo and love from me and all my friends from Hawaii !!! We will defiantly call  you again when we need a cake done & I will recommend you  to all my city friends.
author: Viv G.

description:
30th birthday cake. Chocolate. I forget exactly what frosting I had. The cake portion was SO good. It was moist and yummy. The frosting was a bit thick and sugary. I'm guessing that's normal since I wanted a particular design for the cake. I wish I had a clear picture of the cake, but all of them were of me posing silly next to it. So I'll spare you the horror. 

I was able to communicate with Jennifer easily via email. I even drew out a picture of how I wanted my cake, and she was able to accommodate every request. The cake came out to be $55. Very large cake, fed about 20 guests. With leftover! 

I'll definitely be ordering from Jennifer for special occasions.
author: Alice E.

description: We can't thank Jennifer enough for her artful and delicious cakes and cookies.  They've been the centerpieces at our recent events--most recently at the California Historical Society. Jennifer created (and delivered) an amazing chocolate raspberry sheet cake with a perfect rendering of our logo in the icing. She also baked dozens of  cookies with the same red, white, and blue theme of our party. Both desserts were devoured to the last crumb. Many guests wanted to know where these delectable treats came from. SweetArt by Jennifer is The Place!
author: Susana I.

description: Special ordered a 2 tier cake from Jennifer today. She was super friendly and accommodated everything I wanted in/on the cake including colors. Shes charging me $65 for it versus Noe Valley Bread and Bakery wanting to charge a whooping $160 for the same cake. Haven't gotten the cake yet but will update once I do! Thanks for the great customer service!
author: Dora P.

description: Jennifer was a pleasure to work with. I had to find a bakery that could print a photo on a cake, and she was less than half of the price of the other bakery I found offering this service. Her customer service was great, she reached out to ask questions that showed me she genuinely cared about how the cake turned out. She was responsive and punctual with her delivery. Not to mention, the cake turned out beautifully and tasted even better! Highly recommended!
author: Jacqueline ..

description: I ordered a photo cake from Jennifer this weekend.  The image was great, the cake was delicious and very reasonably priced, and she was able to make it without much turnaround time.  I most definitely recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer.
author: Nichole C.

description:
Jennifer did my little girls 1st Birthday cake and it was awesome, it was a jungle themed cake, so she piped tons and tons of grass on it, it was awesome and so beautiful. My guests and my little girl loved it!   The cake was also so delicious and moist.  
She lives really close to my house, she was very flexible and I couldn't have asked for a better cake!!! Not to mention, her price was the best for what I got!
author: Monica L.

description:
I wanted to bring a unique treat to a friend's housewarming party.  I took a photo of their new house and e-mailed it to Jennifer. She made a lovely sheet cake with the photo on top in edible ink.  

Everybody loved it! What a great service.
author: Jerry A.

description:
Absolutely amazing Yelp find!  After reading the reviews, I gave her a call and I knew I'd found the woman who would bake my wedding cake.  

She meets clients in her home and rents space in a commercial kitchen for her baking.  During our phone calls, we discussed flavors we wanted to taste and set up a time to swing by.  When my fiance and I arrived at her home, we were greeted so warmly and led to the living room.  We talked about our visions, budgets, reviewed her portfolio, and even snuggled with her sweet cat!

She had made 3 small cakes for us to take home and try.  All were good but nothing was quite the winning combination.  When I called her to ask if she wouldn't mind letting us try a few other options, she said it was no problem at all.  

We decided to do a small tier cake for the traditional cake cutting and pictures.  We did marbled cake, mocha filling, and chocolate ganache covered.  To die for!!!  Our colors were chocolate brown, accented with gold, and she added the gold ribbon on each of the layers for us.  

Then, as a cost saving measure and for ease of service, we also did a sheet cake.  For this, we chose lemon cake, raspberry filling, and white buttercream frosting.  The raspberry filling was so amazing and almost wound up in the tier cake as well!  This combination was so wonderful and was great on a warm June afternoon.  Light and delicious, and a great option in addition to our rich chocolate.

Jennifer's service is so warm and wonderful.  The cake is delicious.  And the price is absolutely affordable.  When other bakers are quoting $10++ per serving for a wedding cake, tell them thank you very much, hang up the phone, and call Jennifer.  The quality and value cannot be matched.

Thanks, Jennifer!
author: Melissa Q.

description: Jennifer had been making amazing cakes for our events for the past 3 years.  Not only is she wonderful with creating exactly the sweets we are looking for but she Is able to incorporate photos that we want on each cake making it that more special.  Jennifer's pricing is very reasonable and our guests have always complimented the desserts at our parties.
author: Sherri B.

description: 3rd year getting birthday cakes made by  Jennifer. She makes the MOST beautiful and delicious cakes. My son squeals with delight every year when he sees his cake. She is professional, immaculate with design, timely and very reasonably priced. I couldn't recommend Jennifer more. She is truly gifted.
author: new s.

description: Jennifer created the perfect cake for a surprise celebration on my husband's 70th birthday.  I sent her two photos to be put on the cake, one of my husband and one of his beloved 1946 Chevy. She delivered a delicious banana cake with  Italian rum custard filling and whipped cream icing! It was the perfect finishing touch to a great evening! I will definitely place future cake orders with Jennifer. Give her a try....you won't be disappointed!
author: Pam G.

description:
Absolutely delicious cakes!  Some of the new trendy cupcakeries (eh-hem...ferry bldg patisserie...you know who you are...) are not so tasty, and way overpriced.  But Jennifer's cupcakes are really good, and worth the price.  I've had Jennifer bake me cupcakes for birthdays--and she has always been very sweet and easy to work with.  

I've only had her make photo cakes--cupcakes with edible sugar photo paper on top--and they looked amazing!  I recommend her to anyone looking for cakes for a special occasion--worth the cost.  And she delivers for free.  

Try a photo cupcake for your next b-day.  I found a hideous glamour shot of my mom and served them for her 55th birthday--a total hit!  I think we will use her to make photo cupcakes for my upcoming wedding--using pics of me and my fiancee as kids in sepia tones.

Love her!
author: melinda f.

description: The cake was so moist and delicious and you will craved it all the time you remember it. The price was very reasonable and whtat more you could ask for.
author: Milette I.

description: The picture cake by Jennifer was the  hit of the party!!   The cake was delicious, everybody had 2 pieces and some three but the the  pictures really made this 80th birthday party special.   I went to Jennifer's house with my ideas and pictures, she made a few suggestions about  pictures that might work best, I chose type of cake, filling, and icing , and then I left her to do her magic returning a week later to pick up the cake.   I can't tell you how good I felt  when she showed me the finished product.   If only everything in life went so smoothly.  Also I think the price is very reasonable.
author: Charlene T.

description: For our wedding, we really wanted a simple, DELICIOUS, buttercream frosted cake. I'm a big amateur baker, hate fondant, and had it been possible, would have much preferred to bake my own wedding cake for my day, but I knew better. We tried Susie Cakes out, which is a nice go-to for basic, overpriced and INSANELY sweet desserts, but something about it didn't sit quite right with us. We didn't need a fancy fondant design and didn't want to spend $8-$10 per serving on cake that is all-too-often pushed aside or ignored by wedding guests. I saw reviews for Jennifer on Yelp and decided to give her a try. Be forewarned: if you do NOT like phone conversations and expect super fast email replies from vendors, she isn't your gal. But if you don't mind picking up the phone to confirm details with a vendor, I wouldn't hesitate! We met Jennifer at her house for a casual tasting. She rents out a professional kitchen space to bake cakes for events, so don't worry about any sanitary concerns. Her cakes were light and not overly sweet, and we absolutely loved what we tasted. Her prices are BY FAR some of the most fair I've ever come across for professional cakes. She delivered the cake within a specified time window and let us borrow a drop dead gorgeous silver cake stand at no extra charge. We chose chocolate cake with italian rum custard filling and yellow cake with fresh strawberries/bananas in whipped cream filling, both with a vanilla buttercream. It was to die for. I'll definitely be going to Jennifer for any of my future cake needs when I don't want to do it myself! She was lovely to work with and delivered just as expected.
author: Elizabeth I.

description:
My husband & I had a combined 40th birthday party at the beginning of May and had Jennifer of Sweet Art by Jennifer make edible photo cupcakes for us - we had our baby pictures printed on the cupcakes.  The cupcakes were an absolute hit with our guests...the cupcakes were delicious and our guests loved the baby pictures on them!

Jennifer delivered the cupcakes on time and was very professional.

If you're considering ordering edible photo cupcakes for your event, I highly recommend you order them from Sweet Art by Jennifer!
author: Cyndy W.

description: I'm 3 months late, but I just want to say that Jennifer's cakes are awesome.  She is easy going and worked with us when it came to trying to get my daughters cake for her 1st birthday party.  We were so impressed that we actually bought another cake for her actual birthday too!  The carrot cake is bomb!  I'm just glad my daughter's Minnie Mouse Cakes came out great.  Thanks again Jennifer!
author: David Joseph S.

description: I highly recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer.  Very reasonable price and quick turnaround for a fabulous sheet cake for my son's birthday.  We'll be recommending her to others.
author: Julie T.

description:
I called Jennifer at Sweet Art on Monday.  Left a very detailed and excited message for her.  No response.  Very disappointed.  Was very excited...


Now it is Saturday - still no call.  I guess she has gone out of business.....
author: Jeannie J.

description: I ordered about 20 cupcakes on a Thursday for a birthday party on saturday. with pictures on them. They came out really cute and was a hit! I would recommended for sweets from Jennifer.
author: Francisco R.

description:
Amazing cake and such a reasonable price point!!! 

We ordered a carrot cake from Jennifer at the end of April for the birthdays of my two sisters. My mother handled all of the arrangements, ordering, payment, etc. and has a great experience. Jennifer dropped off the cake, and it was a huge hit that night. 

Beautiful cake and so delicious! I highly recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer and will definitely be back for more!
author: Anny S.

description: I needed a garbage truck cake for my son's birthday!  Jennifer was totally responsive, answering my emails in a timely manner.  Jennifer did an amazing job! It looked great and everyone at the party raved about how good it  was!  It was moist and the frosting, not to sweet!  Reasonably priced, and on time! Highly recommended!  Thanks Jennifer!!
author: Tessa D.

description: Simply awesome. Jennifer has made a few cakes for me, which all have been spectacular!! She has plenty of creative ideas, and is always open to suggestions. It  all is seamless to create your personal cake upon your desire. The cakes are delicious. I've tried a couple of combinations, yet my favorite is Chocolate cake with Raspberry filling. Lastly, the decorations are flawless. I'll upload pictures to share shortly. Highly recommended!!!
author: Julissa C.

description: I ordered a picture cake for a friend's birthday.  It came out perfectly.  The order was done on time, great customer service, and the cake itself - delicious!  We had the banana cake - try it.  Everyone was happy with it!
author: andrea w.

description: Walking through Burlingame Avenue's small Farmers Market I wanted something sweet and came to her stand.  Saw the baklava and immediately huffed it down.  So satisfying.  The phyllo was perfectly done and the filling was sweet.  The nuts, honey and spices were perfectly matched, not too much of one than the other.  I might make this my Sunday guilt spot!  Can't wait to try some of her other items like the lemon bars I saw.
author: Tammie C.

description: Jennifer has been making all our b-day cakes at work for over 15 years now. Even if we call her at the last minute she always comes through with something great!!!  The quality and price can't be beat. THANKS AGAIN JEN!!!
author: Ken H.

description: All I can say is that Jennifer is extremely accommodating and the cupcakes she baked were AMAZING!  I ordered 30 cupcakes in various flavors and had a picture put on each one for my wife's birthday.  Everyone at the party wanted to know where they were made and said they were some of the best they ever had.  I will definitely order from Jennifer again.  Wow, they were sooooo good!
author: Evan B.

description: Jennifer's cake is delicious and gorgeous! She created a beautiful two tiered cake for our wedding that was one tier of chocolate cake with hazelnut filling and another tier of vanilla cake with lemon filling.  It was exactly what I wanted - decorated beautifully but simply in vanilla buttercream and flowers. Her prices are reasonable too! She was a dream to work with and was responsive and professional.
author: Jennifer C.

description: I have placed various custom orders with Jennifer.  From Bridal Shower tiered cakes, to custom girlie, fashion cakes for b-days.  All amazing, cute and delicioso!  She's a true pro and always comes through with exceptional customer service, cakes and art.  She always greets you with a smile.  She's amazing to work with and a pleasure to have in SF.  I am a loyal customer since 2006!  I found her online and haven't turned back.  Now I'm going back for a Christening cake and some B-Day Cup Cakes.  MMMM...  Sweet Goodness.  Thanks, Jennifer!!
author: Ayrie A.

description: I highly recommend Sweet Art by Jennifer!  Her cakes are delicious, moist, and reasonable.  Jennifer is very friendly and accommodating.  I've called in a few last minute requests and she always comes through.  She's also very helpful with custom requests/designs on what will work.
author: Garrett H.

description: We needed a birthday cake, FAST! Not only did Jennifer come through on time, but it had a picture of the birthday boy on it and was the most delicious cake I ever had. I'm almost afraid to write this because I don't want this secret getting out, but it's too good not to share!
author: Sean B.
